venues.name: The Piedmont Club
venues.address: 361 E Main St B, Spartanburg, SC 29302
venues.parking: On-site parking available. Rideshare recommended after 10 PM.
venues.arrival: Dinner is buffet-style at The Piedmont Club. Park at The Piedmont Club and walk 1 minute to the church for the ceremony; we’ll walk back at 5:00 PM.

venues.name: First Presbyterian Church — The Chapel
venues.arrival: Ceremony is at First Presbyterian Church, The Chapel. Please arrive 20–30 minutes early.

airports.name: Charlotte Douglas International Airport
airports.notes: About 1.5–2 hours away; rental car required (not recommended).
